buginformation.summary: [MYFACES-2766] Check StartupFacesContextImpl in ApplicationImpl - ASF JIRA
buginformation.description: The new StartupFacesContextImpl from https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MYFACES-2730 should be checked in ApplicationImpl in methods org.apache.myfaces.application.ApplicationImpl.isFirstRequestProcessed() org.apache.myfaces.application.ApplicationImpl.addELResolver(ELResolver)
